## Data Collection:

The types of data collected by Animation Crafter include:

  1.
Directly Provided Data: This includes user inputs such as animation prompts, image links (specifically Google Drive links), and any specific instructions or preferences for the animation.
Automatically Collected Data: Usage statistics, such as frequency of use, types of animations requested, and general user engagement metrics.

## AI-Specific Considerations:

The AI in Animation Crafter processes personal data as follows:

  * Analyzing user prompts and image links to generate animations.
